channel.title: Need help on music and effect buttons
channel.description: [img]http://img704.imageshack.us/img704/754/screenshot039c.png[/img] I need to make it so the music and effect volume buttons pop up instead of the message saying "Music + Sounds are only available in the high detail version of the game." I know this isn't client-sided because I can log into another server with the same client and those buttons will be there. I think it has something to do with a missing setSidebarInterface or possibly a setClientConfig code that needs to go in the initialize method, but I can't seem to figure out what the codes are. I've been looking in another source I have that has those buttons, but I just can't seem to figure it out. Help? Thanks.

item.title: Need help on music and effect buttons
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:


I need to make it so the music and effect volume buttons pop up instead of the message saying “Music + Sounds are only available in the high detail version of the game.” I know this isn’t client-sided because I can log into another server with the same client and those buttons will be there. I think it has something to do with a missing setSidebarInterface or possibly a setClientConfig code that needs to go in the initialize method, but I can’t seem to figure out what the codes are. I’ve been looking in another source I have that has those buttons, but I just can’t seem to figure it out. Help? Thanks.

Read full topic
